name: Crump Et Al.'S Eight Criteria For Sentience
sources: knowledge_base/papers/edited/Generalizing frameworks for sentience beyond natural species_edited.md
context: Quantitative framework for assessing sentience including nociception, sensory integration, motivational trade-offs, analgesia, flexible self-protection, and associative learning; provides foundation for extending sentience assessment beyond familiar species.
creator: Crump et al.
